column6:
A vicious war between two gangs of escaped super-criminals rages in the streets of New York City! And to stop them, Spider-Man must uncover the secrets of a mysterious woman who is caught in the middle! But will uncovering these secrets jeopardize Spidey's New Avengers connection?,2005,5
32 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Tony Bedard | penciller (cover):Mike Deodato | inker:Raul Fernandez | penciller:Manuel Garcia | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
